class.name: JarPlaneSdf
class.brief_description: An infinite signed distance field (SDF) plane.
class.description: Represents an infinite SDF plane defined by a normal vector and a distance from the origin. Commonly used as a ground or clipping surface in SDF-based modeling or rendering.

members.member: Distance from the origin to the plane along the normal vector. Positive values move the plane in the direction of the normal.
